Mesh partitioning


Functions

GtsGraph * bem3d_mesh_graph (BEM3DMesh *m)
BEM3DMesh * bem3d_mesh_graph_mesh (GtsGraph *g, BEM3DMesh *m)

Detailed Description

Functions for BEM3DMesh partitioning, intended for use in indexing and fast multipole calculations.

Function Documentation

GtsGraph* bem3d_mesh_graph ( BEM3DMesh *  m  ) 

Generate a graph for the connectivity of the elements of a BEM3DMesh.

Parameters:
m a BEM3DMesh.
Returns:
a graph of BEM3DENode's for the elements of m.

BEM3DMesh* bem3d_mesh_graph_mesh ( GtsGraph *  g,
BEM3DMesh *  m 
)

Generate a mesh using the elements of a mesh contained in a graph.

Parameters:
g GtsGraph for elements of m;
m BEM3DMesh.
Returns:
a new BEM3DMesh composed of the elements of m contained in g.
